original_text: Jehoshaphat said, “The word of the Lord is with him.” So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat and the king of Edom went down to him.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 이르되 여호와의 말씀이 그에게 있도다 하는지라 이에 이스라엘 왕과 여호사밧과 에돔 왕이 그에게로 내려가니라

sentences.original_text: The word of the Lord is with him
So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat
and the king of Edom went down to him
